title: This remote-control Monster Jam truck is tipped to be one of the hottest toys for Christmas 2025 - and it's currently reduced to £35 on Amazon - Netmums
text:
This article contains affiliate links, which means we may earn a small amount of money if a reader clicks through and makes a purchase.
The countdown to Christmas is officially on... and experts are releasing their top picks to help frazzled parents figure out what to buy children this year.
DreamToys' 2025 list of innovative toys, games and gadgets that will be Christmas must-haves was released today, featuring 15 toys that have all been picked by a panel of experts and toy retailers from independent brands and big chains alike.
The toys are designed to appeal to a range of ages and interests, from a Peppa Pig interactive baby doll to a 10+ LEGO pirate ship that ties in with Netflix show, One Piece.
The toys range in price from under £15 to £120 for the LEGO pirate ship, with many costing less than £50. (And the pirate ship is currently on sale for sub-£100.)
While there's a toy for everyone on your list from the 15 DreamToys picks, our fave is the toy that will appeal to multiple family members of different ages, interests and genders. Plus, it's interactive.
Here's why we love the Monster Jam Smash & Bash Grave Digger remote-control monster truck for Christmas this year.
© Spin Master
What is the Monster Jam Smash & Bash Grave Digger remote control car?
Licenced toys account for £1 in every £3 spent (36%), and this official Monster Jam remote control car from Spin Master has a 4.6/5 star rating on Amazzon, with customers noting it 'keeps kids entertained', can withstand a 'proper beating' and 'the detailing is spot-on, and it really captures the look of the real Monster Jam truck'.
We like that it can be used from age three and up (parents love it, too), indoors and out, and it encourages kids off screens and moving as they chase it around as it flips, spins, tumbles and speeds.
The 1:15 remote control monster truck boasts authentic Grave Digger detailing with a rugged body and soft rubber tyres, and has an interactive smash mode, where it looks 'smashed' after crashing into walls. You reset it back to its OG state with the touch of a button.
There's a full-function USB-C rechargeable remote control with 20 minutes of uninterrupted play; the controller takes 2 AAA batteries (not included). Customers recommend getting rechargeable batteries as they can drain quickly.
As one happy customer explains: 'It resets itself fast after impacts and hasn’t needed any fiddling or manual fixing. The movement is smooth and quick, and the kids haven’t stopped using it since the day it arrived. The wheels grip even on slick floors, and it handles rougher areas outdoors better than I expected.
'Battery life’s been decent for what it is – enough time for a proper play session before needing a charge. It doesn’t feel cheap or fragile, even when it’s flipped over or thrown around. Some toys get used once and forgotten – this one keeps ending up in the middle of the room, ready for another round'.
The toy typically retails for £49.99 but is 30% off, down to £35, on Amazon currently.
We think this might just be the perfect family toy. Just don't trip over it...
© Spin Master
Monster Jam, Official Smash & Bash Grave Digger Remote Control Indoor & Outdoor Vehicle, now £35 at Amazon (was £49.99)
What else is on the DreamToys must-have Christmas toys list for 2025?
DreamToys' annual list is always highly anticipated, and with the UK toy market growing by 6% so far this year (according to data tracking experts, Circana), it's expected to be a bumper year for Chistmas toy gifting.
Between the cost-of-living crisis and sustainability woes, it's helpful to have the guidance from pros of toys children actually want to play with.
Here are the 15 toys that made the list – many are currently on offer.
5 FAQ on DreamToys’ 2025 Christmas toy picks
1. What is the DreamToys 2025 list?
The DreamToys list is an annual selection of the 15 must-have toys for Christmas, chosen by a panel of industry experts and retailers to highlight the year’s most in-demand and innovative toys.
2. What makes Spin Master's Monster Jam Smash & Bash Grave Digger stand out?
It’s a remote-control monster truck suitable for ages 3+, featuring authentic detailing, flip and crash modes and durable design for both indoor and outdoor play.
It’s interactive, screen-free and fun for kids and adults alike.
3. How much does the Monster Jam RC truck cost and where can I buy it?
The Monster Jam Smash & Bash Grave Digger normally retails for £49.99 but is currently £35 on Amazon, making it one of the more affordable high-impact toys on the list.
4. What other toys made the DreamToys 2025 list?
- LEGO One Piece Pirate Ship (currently £99.99)
- Peppa Pig Oinks & Snuggles Evie Doll (£29.99)
- Pokémon Mega Evolution Elite Trainer Box (£44.99)
- Disney Stitch Interactive Plush (currently £69.99)
- Wicked For Good Singing Dolls (currently £28.99) ..and more, with most priced under £50.
5. Why is this list important for parents and shoppers?
With toy spending up by 6% in 2025 and a wider variety of interests among children, the DreamToys list helps parents identify gifts that are both trending and genuinely engaging, saving time and reducing guesswork during the busy holiday season.
